Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Singlet \Sin"glet\, n. An unlined or undyed waistcoat; a single garment; -- opposed to {doublet}. [Prov. Eng.] [1913 Webster]
singlet n : a collarless men's undergarment for the upper part of the body [syn: {vest}, {undershirt}]
